ðŸ“– Summary: whoBIRD is an Android application that identifies bird sounds in real-time using the BirdNET framework. It boasts an extensive database of over 6,000 bird species and operates offline. The app provides various customization options, including audio source selection, noise filtering, and threshold adjustments for detection sensitivity.
